label: (linux) [build] app
command: cmake -B build -G Ninja && cmake --build build --config Debug

label: (win) [build] app
command: cmake -B build -G Ninja; cmake --build build --config Debug

label: (linux) [build:run] app
command: cmake -B build -G Ninja && cmake --build build --config Debug && ./build/Debug/app.exe

label: (win) [build:run] app
command: cmake -B build -G Ninja; cmake --build build --config Debug; ./build/Debug/app.exe
